channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 'Opening Pathways': LIV Golf CEO Announces Expanded 2026 Opportunities
item.description: LIV Golf expanded the 2026 field to 57 players with three wild card spots available through January promotions.

item.title: Bet365 Bonus Code FOX365 Unlocks $150 in Bonus Bets in Tuesday's NBA Action
item.description: Bet365 Bonus Code FOX365 Unlocks $150 in Bonus Bets for Tuesday December 30 NBA Action.

item.title: Cowboys Reportedly Release CB Trevon Diggs Amid Injury-Plagued Season
item.description: The Cowboys are moving on from two-time Pro Bowl cornerback Trevon Diggs, a move that had been rumored in recent weeks.

item.title: Women's College Basketball Top 10, Bubble Team NET Rankings: MSU Drops, UMD Rises
item.description: Here are the top 10 women's college basketball teams by NET ranking, who is already fighting on the bubble and the biggest risers and fallers through ...

item.title: Soccer's Biggest Winners and Losers of 2025: Lionel Messi Ends Year On High
item.description: New Year's Eve is almost upon us, meaning 2025 is about to be consigned to the past â€” but how will it be remembered by the soccer world?

item.title: Northwestern hires veteran coach Kelly as OC
item.description: Veteran coach Chip Kelly, who won a national title at Ohio State in 2024 as offensive coordinator, was named OC at Northwestern, the school announced ...

item.title: Cowboys release two-time Pro Bowl CB Diggs
item.description: The Cowboys have released cornerback Trevon Diggs. He will become a free agent if he goes unclaimed on waivers.

item.title: Williams nixes portal talk, declares Bama return
item.description: Alabama wide receiver Ryan Williams intends to return to the team in 2026 despite a bumpy sophomore season.

item.title: Pats' Diggs faces strangulation, assault charges
item.description: Patriots wide receiver Stefon Diggs is facing a felony charge of strangulation and a misdemeanor charge of assault from alleged Dec. 2 incident.

item.title: Sources: Angels restructure rest of Rendon deal
item.description: The Angels and Anthony Rendon have agreed to restructure the remainder of his contract, sources told ESPN.
